Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: Melanie1980
Reviews.Content: reviewers noted location excellent 2 mins walk wynyard train station central booked single upgraded twin night slept bed near window bad choice badly tilted left real annoyance 2am night id booked told time booking check computer system makes magnetic keys inoperable midnight night check course key didnt luckily late night attendant wasnt night major noise shared bathrooms clean wouldnt recommend using lift didnt trust

Reviews.Title: “Great value hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel basic represents excellent value money condition spotlessly clean bathrooms bedrooms clean sometimes rare breakfast self serve adequate city centre noisy located transport

Reviews.Title: “Was very happy - I got what I expected - IT'S A PUB!”
Reviews.Author: Love2Travel2350
Reviews.Content: reading reviews staying little worried arrived found expected prior reading reviews pub location people expect pub compare services hotelmotel checkin remember pub serve couple beers sit relax beer yourself wait bathrooms toilet breakfast simple clean quaint pub sort husband romantic breakfast cocoa pops toast breakfast sad listened quietness city morning grand hotel reasonable quiet location saying cant beleive centre sydney wasnt door partying night luckily exhausted slept saying grand hotels fault remember pub centre sydney grand hotel awesome value money stay
